00036 // didn't use formatting from our codeguideline for interface methods to stay compatible with original GLUT interface
00037 namespace PgGLUT {
00038     // some intern methods/data
00039     namespace {
00040         bool initialized = false;
00041 
00042         boost::function<void ()> display_callback_;
00043         boost::function<void (int width, int height)> reshape_callback_;
00044         boost::function<void (unsigned char key, int x, int y)> keyboard_callback_;
00045         boost::function<void (int button, int state, int x, int y)> mouse_callback_;
00046 
00047         // delegates to be registered as GLUT callbacks
00048         void display_callback_delegate() { display_callback_(); }
00049         void keyboard_callback_delegate(unsigned char key, int x, int y) { keyboard_callback_(key, x, y); }
00050         void mouse_callback_delegate(int button, int state, int x, int y) { mouse_callback_(button, state, x, y); }
00051         void reshape_callback_delegate(int width, int height) { reshape_callback_(width, height); }
00052     }
00053 
00060     void init(const std::string& window_name, int& argc, char** argv, int width=500, int height=500, int x=0, int y=0) {
00061         if (!initialized) {
00062             ::glutInit(&argc, argv);
00063             ::glutInitWindowSize(width, height);
00064             ::glutInitWindowPosition(x, y);
00065             ::glutCreateWindow(window_name.c_str());
00066             initialized = true;
00067         }
00068     }
00069 
00076     void glutMainLoop() {
00077         if (!initialized) {
00078             std::cerr << "Warning: cannot enter GLUT main loop (GLUT not initialized)" << std::endl;
00079             return;
00080         }
00081 		::glutMainLoop();
00082     }
00083 
00088     void glutDisplayFunc(boost::function<void ()> func) {
00089         display_callback_ = func;
00090 		::glutDisplayFunc(&display_callback_delegate);
00091     }
00092 
00097     void glutKeyboardFunc(boost::function<void (unsigned char key, int x, int y)> func) {
00098         keyboard_callback_ = func;
00099 		::glutKeyboardFunc(&keyboard_callback_delegate);
00100     }
00101 
00106     void glutMouseFunc(boost::function<void (int button, int state, int x, int y)> func) {
00107         mouse_callback_ = func;
00108 		::glutMouseFunc(&mouse_callback_delegate);
00109     }
00110 
00115     void glutReshapeFunc(boost::function<void (int width, int height)> func) {
00116         reshape_callback_ = func;
00117 		::glutReshapeFunc(&reshape_callback_delegate);
00118     }
00119 };

00121 #endif /* PGGLUT_H_ */
